alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 6:35PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CST... At 634 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Devers, or near Nome, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Sour Lake, Nome, Bevil Oaks, and China. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 853 and 841. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
